text: Now that we're almost certain Nintendo will announce quite a few Mario games this year, including a new Paper Mario, I'm excited to see this series hopefully return to greatness. Just stop trying to find new gameplay experiences and give us a classic RPG like this game or TTYD and we'll all be happy (I did love Super Paper Mario as well). This theme brings all the nostalgia of playing around the paper visuals for the first time and searching for secrets.
author: SupraDarky

author: Matt 6418

text: I agree about the return to a proper turn based RPG like it was, the first paper Mario is arguably my favourite game ever. I also liked Super and Color Splash but not to the same level as the RPGs, only one I didn't really like too much was sticker star. As well as the gameplay and splitting everything up into miniature levels, it just lacked the right atmosphere for a paper Mario game for me.

text: Personally, I hope they go for the Super Paper Mario style of gameplay again. The first two's combat style was ok, but I feel SPM's felt closer to classic Mario gameplay while giving it the depth of an Action RPG. Of course, I would like it to be as charming as the first two games as well, so having Partners return would be nice. :)
